snippet: The Justice Department has asked a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit by the House committee seeking to compel the Obama administration to release more internal records involving the troubled gun operation known as Fast and Furious.
abstract: The Justice Department has asked a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit by the House committee seeking to compel the Obama administration to release more internal records involving the troubled gun operation known as Fast and Furious.

headline.main: Justice Department Seeks to Dismiss Lawsuit Over Operation Fast and Furious

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
